fluvgeo 2025.04.19
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Calculate metric ratios for each cross section

Source: R/xs_metric_ratios.R
xs_metric_ratios.Rd

Calculates metric ratios for each cross section in the input xs_dims data frame.

xs_metric_ratios(xs_dimensions)

Arguments

xs_dimensions

sf object; A `cross_section_dimensions` fluvgeo data structure.

Value

Returns the input xs_dims data frame of cross sections with the calculated metric ratio variables added.

Examples

# Calculate cross section planform dimensions
xs_dims_plan <- planform_dimensions(fluvgeo::sin_riffle_floodplain_dims_L2_sf,
                                    fluvgeo::sin_bankline_points_sf)

xs_dims_ratios <- xs_metric_ratios(xs_dims_plan)
